mapper.select: select * FROM RESUME where USER_CODE = (select USER_CODE from USER_INFO where user_code = #{userCode})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SubmitResume SELECT (select cor_code from Recruitment where cor_code = #{corCode} and Announcement_Code = #{announcementCode}) as COR_CODE, USER_CODE, User_ResumeEmail , Military_Status , Marital_Status , EmployType_Code , Recruit_Field_Code , Resume_title , Academic_record_Code , Career_Code , Cover_letter , License , Activity , Portfolio , Reading_Code , RESUME_DATE FROM resume where USER_CODE = (select USER_CODE from USER_INFO where user_code = #{userCode})
